note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: rotated by pushing the feet against a fixed surface or by running
with seats performing movements in a horizontal plane, other than circular movements
with seats moving with a planetary motion in a horizontal plane
with seats moving up-and-down, e.g. figure-seats
with seats two or more of which form a see-saw
with seats moving in an undulating track
with movably-mounted swing-like seats not moving radially outwards
with turntables moved up and down
with turntables and movably-mounted vehicles thereon which move to the outside when the roundabout is rotated
Accessories for roundabouts not restricted to one of groups A63G1/00 or A63G3/00

reference.text: rocking chairs as nursery furniture A47D13/10

title-part.text: with seats shaped as riding horses, breeches, or the like
Special fastenings of the suspensory point
Driving mechanisms, such as ropes, gear, belt, motor drive
Like devices resting on the ground
with dismountable runners usable for other purposes
Rocking horses on runners adapted for progressive movement
made to travel by riding movements other than by ratchet wheels
Swingably-mounted toy animals for riding made to travel by means of parallelogram-joints
made to travel by ratchet-wheels, e.g. by stretching the legs
by pressing the seats or saddles up-and-down
by moving the stirrups or pedals
with forced removal of the passenger from the seat
Slideways with movably suspended cars, or with cars moving on ropes, or the like

CPC-specific-text.text: , e.g. by moving the whole body

reference.text: rotating or rocking exercising for training agility or coordination of movements A63B22/14, A63B22/16, A63B22/18

title-part.text: with special movements of the seat-carriers
Rolling drums turning somersaults with or without rolling seats

reference.text: hoop exercising apparatus driven by the user A63B19/00

title-part.text: with seats staying at the bottom of the drum

reference.text: hoop exercising apparatus driven by the user A63B19/00

title-part.text: with undulatory motion of the substructure
with looping, hopping, or throwing motions of the substructure
with escalators or similar moving substructures

reference.text: connection of valves to inflatable elastic bodies B60C29/00

title-part.text: Devices allowing competitions between several persons, not otherwise provided for
Means for transporting or storing public amusement arrangements
